2022 lighting and vis dev demo reel

After graduation, I was having a hard time coming up with an idea for my demo reel, I didn’t have a vision.

At the height of Covid, my last grandparent passed away and family decided to sell their old house, I couldn’t be there in person.

Being thousands of kilometers away from them, I needed some sort of closure,

saying goodbye to a monumental chapter of my life.

“Hmm, this does sound like a vision to me”

I said,

784 hours later, I got myself a demo reel.

Closure? yeah, I got that one through meditation tho.

2020 graduation lighting demo reel
